Open-Source LLMs with Ollama

Stand up local LLM inference, quantization, and prompt tooling with Ollama + open models.

Awarded for deploying optimized open-source LLMs.

Deliverable: Dockerfile and README describing the local deployment steps.

Capstone

Local Model Service

Bundle an Ollama mod file + FastAPI server for a specialized prompt workflow.
